WebDriverCommandsCloseWindow.summary: The Close Window command of the WebDriver API closes the current top-level browsing context (window or tab) and returns with the list of currently open WebWindows. If it is the last window that is being closed, the WebDriver session will implicitly be deleted. Subsequent commands after the session is ended will therefore cause invalid session ID errors.

remarks.para:
-Switch To Window command
-Get Window Handle command
-Get Window Handles command
